snippet: A Facebook post this month extolling the lower cost of living in Berlin has revived a raw debate in Israel, with pundits and politicians denouncing those who want to leave as anti-Zionist traitors.
abstract: Israelis for years have been drawn to Berlin's cosmopolitan flair but Facebook post extolling the lower cost of living there has revived a raw debate in Israel; pundits and politicians denounce those who want to migrate to Berlin, which has a growing community of Israelis, as anti-Zionist traitors; backlash over migration to Germany points to deep insecurities in still-young country.
lead_paragraph: A Facebook post this month extolling the lower cost of living in Berlin has revived a raw debate in Israel, with pundits and politicians denouncing those who want to leave as anti-Zionist traitors.

headline.main: In Exodus From Israel to Germany, a Young Nation’s Fissures Show
